Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

HTIMER

The basic type HTIMER is a handle to a Miles timer callback.

Discussion

HTIMER handles are returned from the AIL_register_timer function.


Group: Basic Types
Related Functions: AIL_register_timer, AIL_release_timer_handle, AIL_set_timer_divisor, AIL_set_timer_frequency, AIL_set_timer_period, AIL_set_timer_user, AIL_start_timer, AIL_stop_timer
